string.value: I obtained a book inscribed with fire. It seems unusual... Let's go ask #b#p2081200##k.

When I asked #b#p2081200##k, she told me to go see #b#p1032001##k in Ellinia to find out more about it. #b#p1032001##k should know about the book since he/she know a lot about magic.\n\n#t4161016# #b#c4161016# / 1#k
#b#p1032001##k was astonished by the legend and decided to break the spell that was cast on the book.
What brought you to the Forest of Bishop, magician? I can't answer all your questions, but I can give you some advice. Do you want to ask about the book you have?
Nothing is written but I can feel that the burning flames on the cover has strong magical energy. Yes.. This has hidden magic. Very strong as well...
Go to see #b#p1032001##k in Ellinia...He's been a elder of magicians for ages. He can help you.
I thought you needed more knowledge. Did I misunderstand you?
All the knowledge about magic is included inside. You can find anything you need. Huh? Did #b#p2081200##k send you to me? Then there must be something important. Do you want to ask about this book?
Oh! This book definitely has strong Fire element-based magical properties. Fire magic is hidden in this book!
I'm so happy to see a new magic technique. It's not impossible to unlock the magic hidden in the book...I'll do it for you. Just wait a few moments...
One can always study magic in Ellinia.
